trans-unit.source: Represents a service that must be added to the workflow run-time engine for local services communications to be enabled.
Local service implementations are required to be added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> for these services to be properly initialized and registered.
A local service implementation is a class that implements an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
Local services added in this way are used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
A collection of parameters used to configure the service.
The allowed values are an empty collection or a collection that contains only the `ConfigurationSection` key.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
The name of the configuration section that contains this service's desired configuration.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> class.
The configuration section that contains settings for this service.
Adds the specified service to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
An object that represents the service to add.
service is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The external run-time container was not found.
Gets the service implementation of the specified interface type, if the service is available.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the interface implemented by the service to retrieve.
An object that implements the requested service, or null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
service is a null reference (`Nothing`).
The service is not registered with the runtime.
Removes the specified service from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
An object that represents the service to remove.
service is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The service is not registered with the runtime.
Adds local services if a configuration section was specified during construction of the object.
